title: Hate This & Iâ€™ll Love You
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Oh, I am growing tired
Of allowing you to steal
Everything I have
You're making me feel
[Chorus]
Like I was born to service you
But I am growing by the hour
[Verse 2]
You left us far behind
So we all discard our souls
And blaze through your skies
So unafraid to die
[Chorus]
'Cause I was born to destroy you!
And I am growing by the hour
[Bridge]
And I'm getting strong in every way, yeah!
Yeah-yeah-yeah!
[Interlude]
You led me on
You led me on
Ooh

[Instrumental Bridge]
[Bridge]
And I'm getting strong in every way, yeah!
Yeah-yeah-yeah! Ooh
[Outro]
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ah
Ooh...
